name: @ondewo/nlu-client-nodejs
description: Ondewo natural language understanding client library for nodejs as a commonjs module

scripts.build: git submodule update --init --recursive && docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/..:/output-volume ondewo-nodejs-proto-compiler ondewo-nlu-api ondewo

author: Philipp Schweiger @ Ondewo
